item.title: Discover the Simple Trick to Activating Screen Record on Your iPhone 14!
item.description: Introduction Do you have an iPhone 14? If so, you may be wondering how to activate the Screen Record feature. Don’t worry, it’s easy! With just a few simple steps, you can start recording your iPhone 14’s screen in no time. Steps to Activate Screen Record Open the Settings app on your iPhone 14. Scroll down to the “Control Center” section and tap it. Tap “Customize Controls”. Scroll down to the “Screen Recording” option and tap the green “+” icon next to it.
